programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep13
programme.desc: The Case Of The Stuck Toys - When Noddy arrives at Toy Green Station, he finds some toys stuck to the ground: someone has spread some glue all over the station platform! Why would someone do that? Noddy investigates.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Untidy Pirates - It's Tidy Toyland Day and Noddy wants to win the Tidy Toyland Trophy. Unfortunately he's also invited the untidy Pirates round to play! Noddy has to figure out how he can play with the Pirates and win the Tidy Toyland Trophy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Ruined Race - It's the Brickabuild Sports & Fun Day and Clockwork Mouse tells Carlton she doesn't want ANY accidents. But when the Egg & Spoon Race comes to a grinding halt, Noddy has to find out who is trying to ruin the race.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Investigation Kit - It's the Royal Egg Hunt and Noddy's investigation kit goes missing. With Bumpy and Revs, Noddy soon finds some of his things, but not his binoculars. Someone must be using them, but what for? Noddy needs to find out in time before the Egg Hunt starts.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Bell Flowers - Raa Raa is waiting for the beautiful Bell Flowers to open but can the fidgety lion sit still long enough to see one

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Funniest Laugh - Raa Raa and his friends try to find things that make funny noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep15
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Ladybird Den - Crocky doesnt know where his collection of sticks has gone until Pia realises Raa Raa took them by mistake.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion Ep16
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Speedy Racers - Raa Raa and his friends are racing their vehicles through the Jingly Jangly Jungle but who will win

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep13
programme.desc: Marsha Wonderful Life - Marsha overhears the others saying she is too bossy. She decides that Silver hatch would be a better place without her. Chaos swiftly ensues, can Marsha be persuaded to stay, they can't cope without her!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep14
programme.desc: Let's Hear It For Big Chris - Big Chris is working on Loada while the others plan a surprise evening for him for being the longest serving member of Silver hatch

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep15
programme.desc: Funny Business - Big Chris receives a mysterious parcel… the cars are intrigued to find out what is in it. Strange and silly things start happening at the workshop, could it have anything to do with Big Chris' package?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep7
programme.desc: Scare Scouts / Boo - Scare Scouts When Frankengymteacher forms a scout troop, Casper is the first to sign up. Boo! During a visit to Deedstown, Casper and his friends are shocked to find the humans dressed as scary creatures…it must Halloween!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep8
programme.desc: Abra-Ca-Deedstown / Shrinky Dust - Abra-Ca-Deedstown From cleaning Ra's sarcophagus, to starring in Jimmy's magic act, Casper has been helping so much, he's exhausted. Shrinky Dust When magical Shrinky Dust falls into Norman the bully's hands, Casper and Jimmy find themselves on a hunt to get it back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep28
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Angry Abnormal Atrocities of the Astute Animal Agressors - Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission…and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - There’s a new “babblist” in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Baby’s help.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep66
programme.desc: Save The Town - When Puss and the gang return from the netherworld to find San Lorenzo overrun by thieves, they strike out to find the missing villagers

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep14
programme.desc: The Imposter / Frenemy - When there is an imposter in Troll Village, Branch and Poppy embark on a man-hunt as to try to keep the Trolls from realizing that anything is off/Poppy discovers that Archer Pastry belongs to a group of evil creatures called the Party Crashers

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep40
programme.desc: The All Hail King Julien Show - King Julien launches a new TV channel called “Julien-Vision” but quickly realizes that the kingdom only wants to watch a reality show of his own life

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep14
programme.desc: Big in Japan - Waldo and Wenda travel to Tokyo for a Manga festival and meet up with Koichi, fellow Wanderer and Go Hero Go fan. But when Fritz is accidentally zapped by the Mega Mega Monster key, he grows to the size of Godzilla and tries to eat all the noodles in the city. The wanderers must stop him and get the key back.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Olivia Ep27
programme.desc: Olivia The Nature Photographer - After snapping some great photos of her cat Edwin, Olivia thinks she's ready to photograph some real wild animals. She and Julian camp out in the backyard to wait for some, and sure enough they track down a mysterious animal in the bushes. But is it really a wild beast?

programme.title: Olivia Ep28
programme.desc: The Two Olivias - There's a new girl in Olivia's class and her name is...Olivia! Confusion ensues, and Olivia (the original Olivia) can't believe that she shares her name with another person. After a brief stint calling herself “Pam,” Olivia eventually decides that a two Olivia town might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep27
programme.desc: Motor Mouth - The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep28
programme.desc: Dancing Queen - Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep15
programme.desc: It Crushes / Rebel Without A Paws - Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep14
programme.desc: Lucky And The Long Way Home - Spirit and Lucky desperately try to find a way back to one another.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Park - When Audrey's big sister, Zoe, and her friends take over the park, Audrey needs all the Harvey Kids to help beat the bigger kids.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep14
programme.desc: Gypsy Moth Prophecies / Skidzo-Brainia - A fortune-telling moth forecasts doom for Whiplash and though Whip is skeptical, the crew tries to keep him safe so the it doesn't come true. // Skidmark learns the crew is tired of his crazy behavior so he invents a helmet that changes his personality in unpredictable ways.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep14
programme.desc: Grumblegard, Part 2 - The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Deep Freeze / The Trojan Seahorse - The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Golden Banana Treasure - Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Extreme Dodge Bubble - Vola puts it all on the line to win an epic game of Extreme Dodge Bubble.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Baby Super Shark - Vigo's evil plot to turn everyfishy in Carnivore Cove into babies backfires when toddlers Super Shark and Captain Kelp turn out to be a finful.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies - Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.desc: What's Your Name? - The Teletubbies enjoy a game of 'What's your name?' Later, there's a surprise when a bowl of Tubby Custard joins in with the game!

programme.desc: Don't Zoo That / Maxed Out - Adelaide and Carl battle it out to win Jr. Zookeeper badges but their fighting might ruin both of their chances. // Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back - no matter what!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep110
programme.desc: A Very Rocky Rakhi/The Back Up Plan - It's Raksha Bandhan but Sammy can think of nothing worse than spending the day bonding with his sister. // The boys back up the App for safe keeping. Unfortunately, a tech malfunction causes the app to download to every phone on the house wifi!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Last Days of Summer - Alvin wastes his entire summer playing a video game then tries to do all the fun things he'd planned in one day.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: Life of the Party - The Chipmunks along with Kevin and Cheesy decide to crash BoCarter's birthday yacht party after not being invited.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep422
programme.desc: You Troll - The chipmunks try to keep Dave from getting on the internet after a performance he posts gets negative comments.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep157
programme.desc: Squidward's School for Grown Ups / Oral Report - When Pat suddenly grows a very grown-up beard, he decides it’s time to act like a grown-up, too. // While preparing to give an oral report for boating school, SpongeBob realizes that he’s got a horrible case of stage fright.

programme.title: Rugrats S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Moon Story - The babies travel to the other side of the moon to stop Angelica from learning all the secrets of the universe.

programme.title: Rugrats S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Crossing the Antarctic - Tommy and his friends cross the frozen tundra to find help for Angelica after she "hurts" her leg.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Two of Clubs / Vacation Daze - Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

programme.title: The Loud House S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Fed Up / Shell Shock - Tired of monotonous meals, the kids make a plan to sabotage dinner so they can have pizza. // Lincoln and Ronnie Anne have to take care of an egg baby but Lincoln doesn’t trust her with the fragile egg.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep39
programme.desc: Jellyfish Hunter / The Fry Cook Games - Mr. Krabs discovers that customers love SpongeBob's special jellyfish jelly Krabby Patty. He begins to take advantage of the jellyfish. // Mr. Krabs enters SpongeBob in the Fry Cook Games where he competes against Patrick.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep197
programme.desc: Mall Girl Pearl / Two Thumbs Down - Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep241
programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep242

programme.title: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Main Event - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: Liqui Moly Motorrad Grand Prix Deutschland Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Car and bike races have been held on closed public roads in the area around the town of Chemnitz, Germany since the 1920s and were still taking place until as recently as 1990. It was decided, however, that the five mile course through such a densely populated area was no longer suitable and a new circuit was built five miles west of Chemnitz in 1996. Although mainly used as a driver training centre and road transport safety station, Sachsenring first hosted MotoGP in 1998 and many improvements have taken place since then, including a drastic layout enhancement in 2001. Numerous tight corners make it one of the slower tracks on the calendar but there is never any shortage of close racing action.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2305
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the greatest featherweights of all-time makes his return to the Octagon on April 15 when Max “Blessed” Holloway faces off with British sensation Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at T-Mobile Center in Kansas City, Missouri. Eager to get back in the race to regain his title, Hawaii’s Holloway has won two of his last three, defeating Calvin Kattar and Yair Rodriguez, and he is ready to pull out all the stops against Allen, who’s 12-fight winning streak includes victories over Kattar, Dan Hooker and Sodiq Yusuff.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Holloway vs. Allen

programme.title: Motul TT Assen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The TT Assen held each June is a truly special event on the MotoGP™ calendar and one of the biggest annual sporting occasions in the Netherlands. Thousands of fans flock from across Europe to create a fantastic atmosphere and to play a part in the continuing heritage of this festival of motorsport. Known as “The Cathedral” of motorcycle racing, Assen proudly holds the honour of being the only venue to have uninterruptedly held a round of the Motorcycle World Championship every year since its creation in 1949.
